long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Merge Cafe! This innovative game allows you to run a coffee shop and merge coffee food items. As the owner of a cafe, you'll have the opportunity to merge different coffee food items to create unique and delicious combinations. Attract customers and build a successful coffee culture. Are you ready to showcase your management skills?

Key Features:

Merge Coffee Food Items: The game offers a variety of coffee food items, such as coffee beans, milk, syrups, and desserts. By merging similar coffee food items, you can create new items like lattes, cappuccinos, and more. Unleash your creativity and merge unique coffee food items to attract more customers.

Customer Demands: Each customer has their own taste and preferences. By carefully observing the demands of your customers, you can prepare coffee food items that cater to their preferences. Satisfying customer demands will earn positive reviews and recommendations, attracting more customers to your cafe.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
